title: How to Make an Image Classifier - Intro to Deep Learning #6
excerpt: We're going to make our own Image Classifier for cats & dogs in 40 lines of Python! First we'll go over the history of image classification, then we'll dive into the concepts behind convolutional networks and why they are so amazing.  Coding challenge for this video: https://github.com/llSourcell/how_to_make_an_image_classifier
